instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 820-3208 Need Bios with SN added
threads.message:
Got a 820-3208 that had the bios swapped by someone and its running dog slow. I dont know how to clean the ME region or add the serial so needing some help. 

Serial Number is C02KL348DRV7
Sticker on board is C02317201KBF9DHAK

threads.title: 820-3208 Need Bios with SN added
threads.message: Id love to learn how to do this so I dont have to plz bro these.

threads.title: 820-3208 Need Bios with SN added
threads.message:
If you want to do it yourself, Medusa programmer is a must.
I will try to do it tomorrow...

threads.title: 820-3208 Need Bios with SN added
threads.message:
[QUOTE="2informaticos, post: 49072"]If you want to do it yourself, Medusa programmer is a must.
I will try to do it tomorrow...
[/QUOTE]

Thank you. Anything helps. I just need to get this thing done so the owner can use it.

threads.title: 820-3208 Need Bios with SN added
threads.message:
Try this and let us know the result...
[url]https://drive.google.com/open?id=1jpIEVzlkeVtfBh_l25KU0jIp3cXZvscS[/url]

threads.title: 820-3208 Need Bios with SN added
threads.message: I put that on. It had an EFI passcode. I removed it no biggy. Its still running really slow. Starting to think its an issue with the SSD possibly? Although the mouse seems sluggish also so it seems like a Kernel Panic kinda of slowness.

threads.title: 820-3208 Need Bios with SN added
threads.message:
Sorry, I dont have a known good working BIOS file.
I didn't know that had password; could remove it with Medusa...

Disconnect SSD and test with your OSX through USB.
Also run ASD.

threads.title: 820-3208 Need Bios with SN added
threads.message: I removed the EFI Lock. Its been installing the OS now for about an hour but says 10 min left. Its running very slow. I assume the ME region is wrong. Where is Duke! lol

threads.title: 820-3208 Need Bios with SN added
threads.message:
I did ME region with Medusa!
Problem is that I didn't get a known good BIOS to work on it...

threads.message:
